attributes.action: Ban heavy goods vehicles over 7.5 tonnes from using unclassified and C classified roads in rural areas.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As a Lincolnshire resident we have to put up with 40 tonne articulated lorries cutting through inappropriate country lanes on a regular basis. This is causing massive amounts of wear and tear to the poorly constructed road surfaces and structural damage to our homes as well as risking the lives of cyclists and pedestrians as there are hardly any footpaths or cycleways.
